trans-unit.resname: V16·1 | Beseech the Queen | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Beseech the Queen
trans-unit.target: Beseech the Queen

trans-unit.resname: V16·1 | Beseech the Queen | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a card with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of lands you control, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for a card with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of lands you control, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

trans-unit.resname: V16·1 | Beseech the Queen | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Those who hear her go mad with inspiration.
trans-unit.target: Those who hear her go mad with inspiration.

trans-unit.source: Cabal Ritual
trans-unit.target: Cabal Ritual

trans-unit.source: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool. Threshold — Add {B}{B}{B}{B}{B} to your mana pool instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool. Threshold — Add {B}{B}{B}{B}{B} to your mana pool instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

trans-unit.source: The Patriarch is long dead, but his name still stains the lips of cultists.
trans-unit.target: The Patriarch is long dead, but his name still stains the lips of cultists.

trans-unit.source: Conflux
trans-unit.target: Conflux

trans-unit.source: Search your library for a white card, a blue card, a black card, a red card, and a green card. Reveal those cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for a white card, a blue card, a black card, a red card, and a green card. Reveal those cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

trans-unit.source: "It's self-indulgent, I admit, but I do like to watch my own symphony play itself out."\n—Nicol Bolas
trans-unit.target: "It's self-indulgent, I admit, but I do like to watch my own symphony play itself out."\n—Nicol Bolas

trans-unit.source: Dark Depths
trans-unit.target: Dark Depths

trans-unit.source: Dark Depths enters the battlefield with ten ice counters on it. {3}: Remove an ice counter from Dark Depths. When Dark Depths has no ice counters on it, sacrifice it. If you do, put a legendary 20/20 black Avatar creature token with flying and indestructible named Marit Lage onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: Dark Depths enters the battlefield with ten ice counters on it. {3}: Remove an ice counter from Dark Depths. When Dark Depths has no ice counters on it, sacrifice it. If you do, put a legendary 20/20 black Avatar creature token with flying and indestructible named Marit Lage onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: V16·5 | Glissa, the Traitor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Glissa, the Traitor
trans-unit.target: Glissa, the Traitor

trans-unit.resname: V16·5 | Glissa, the Traitor | Card Text
trans-unit.source: First strike, deathtouch Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: First strike, deathtouch Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

trans-unit.resname: V16·5 | Glissa, the Traitor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Once Mirrodin's brightest hope. Now Phyrexia's cruel champion.
trans-unit.target: Once Mirrodin's brightest hope. Now Phyrexia's cruel champion.

trans-unit.source: Helvault
trans-unit.target: Helvault

trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Exile target creature you control. {7}, {T}: Exile target creature you don't control. When Helvault is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return all cards exiled with it to the battlefield under their owners' control.
trans-unit.target: {1}, {T}: Exile target creature you control. {7}, {T}: Exile target creature you don't control. When Helvault is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return all cards exiled with it to the battlefield under their owners' control.

trans-unit.source: Memnarch
trans-unit.target: Memnarch

trans-unit.source: {1}{U}{U}: Target permanent becomes an artifact in addition to its other types. {3}{U}: Gain control of target artifact.
trans-unit.target: {1}{U}{U}: Target permanent becomes an artifact in addition to its other types. {3}{U}: Gain control of target artifact.

trans-unit.source: "An imperfection in the perfect world? We can't allow that."
trans-unit.target: "An imperfection in the perfect world? We can't allow that."

trans-unit.source: Mind's Desire
trans-unit.target: Mind's Desire

trans-unit.source: Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)
trans-unit.target: Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

trans-unit.resname: V16·9 | Momir Vig, Simic Visionary | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Momir Vig, Simic Visionary
trans-unit.target: Momir Vig, Simic Visionary

trans-unit.resname: V16·9 | Momir Vig, Simic Visionary | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a green creature spell, you may search your library for a creature card and reveal it. If you do, shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. Whenever you cast a blue creature spell, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put that card into your hand.
trans-unit.target: Whenever you cast a green creature spell, you may search your library for a creature card and reveal it. If you do, shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. Whenever you cast a blue creature spell, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put that card into your hand.

trans-unit.source: Near-Death Experience
trans-unit.target: Near-Death Experience

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have exactly 1 life, you win the game.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have exactly 1 life, you win the game.

trans-unit.source: Lands ravaged, cities in ruins, so many lives sacrificed, and yet there was no other word for it but victory.
trans-unit.target: Lands ravaged, cities in ruins, so many lives sacrificed, and yet there was no other word for it but victory.

trans-unit.source: Obliterate
trans-unit.target: Obliterate

trans-unit.source: Obliterate can't be countered. Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: Obliterate can't be countered. Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.

trans-unit.source: For his family, Barrin made a funeral pyre of Tolaria.
trans-unit.target: For his family, Barrin made a funeral pyre of Tolaria.

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Processor
trans-unit.target: Phyrexian Processor

trans-unit.source: As Phyrexian Processor enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life. {4}, {T}: Put an X/X black Minion creature token onto the battlefield, where X is the life paid as Phyrexian Processor entered the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: As Phyrexian Processor enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life. {4}, {T}: Put an X/X black Minion creature token onto the battlefield, where X is the life paid as Phyrexian Processor entered the battlefield.

trans-unit.source: Umezawa's Jitte
trans-unit.target: Umezawa's Jitte

trans-unit.source: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage, put two charge counters on Umezawa's Jitte. Remove a charge counter from Umezawa's Jitte: Choose one — • Equipped creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. • Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. • You gain 2 life. Equip {2}
trans-unit.target: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage, put two charge counters on Umezawa's Jitte. Remove a charge counter from Umezawa's Jitte: Choose one — • Equipped creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. • Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. • You gain 2 life. Equip {2}

trans-unit.source: Unmask
trans-unit.target: Unmask

trans-unit.source: You may exile a black card from your hand rather than pay Unmask's mana cost. Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
